I like reading.
I m smart too.
I am short.
I am also round.

participant_2.background:
My mom is a professional tennis player.
My favorite food is spaghetti and meatballs.
My favorite band is one direction.
I hope to be a football player when i grow up.

content.text: I'm a big fan of reading. I love to read anything I can get my hands on. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but my favorite is probably mystery. I love the suspense and the thrill of trying to figure out whodunnit.
I love mystery books too! I'm always so excited to turn the page and see what happens next.
Me too! I love the feeling of being totally immersed in a story.
What's your favorite mystery book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think one of my favorites is The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
I definitely recommend it! It's a really good read.
So, what are some of your other interests?
I like to play sports. My favorite sport is football. I hope to be a professional football player when I grow up.
That's awesome! I used to play football when I was younger. It's a lot of fun.
I know, right? It's so exciting.
So, what's your favorite football team?
My favorite team is the Dallas Cowboys. They're my hometown team.
I'm a fan of the Cowboys too! They're a great team.
I know, right? They're always in the playoffs.
So, what are you planning to do after high school?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to college to play football.
That would be awesome! I'm sure you'd be a great football player.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you think your future holds?
I'm not sure, but I'm excited to find out.
